<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202730</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">"The American Dream"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"Der Amerikanische Traum"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"Le Rêve Américain"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"O Sonho Americano"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"Il Sogno Americano"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Το αμερικανικό όνειρο"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">"El Sueño Americano"</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In conjunction with a unit on Puritanism, students will define and illustrate their personal definition of "The American Dream" or their concept of the dream in general.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In Verbindung mit einer Maßeinheit auf 
Puritanismus, definieren Kursteilnehmer und veranschaulichen ihre 
persönliche Definition "des amerikanischen Traums" oder ihres 
Konzeptes des Traums im allgemeinen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En même temps qu'une unité sur le puritanisme, 
les étudiants définiront et illustreront leur définition 
personnelle "du rêve américain" ou de leur concept du rêve en 
général.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conjuntamente com uma unidade no puritanism, os 
estudantes definirão e ilustrarão sua definição pessoal "do sonho 
americano" ou de seu conceito do sonho no general.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insieme con un'unità su puritanism, gli allievi 
definiranno ed illustreranno la loro definizione personale "del sogno 
americano" o del loro concetto del sogno in generale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Από κοινού με μια μονάδα σε Puritanism, οι 
σπουδαστές θα καθορίσουν και θα επεξηγήσουν τον προσωπικό 
καθορισμό τους "του αμερικανικού ονείρου" ή έννοιάς τους του 
ονείρου γενικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjuntamente con una unidad en puritanism, los 
estudiantes definirán e ilustrarán su definición personal "del 
sueño americano" o de su concepto del sueño en general.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

        </lifeCycle>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
